{"id":672913020,"lang":"swift","time":"3Â months","timestamp":1648984107,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"48 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/672913020/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Remove Duplicates from Sorted Array","memory":"15.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    func removeDuplicates(_ nums: inout [Int]) -> Int {\n        // Just shift non-duplicate elements to left-most\n        \n        var leftIndexToShift = 0 \n        for index in 1..<nums.count {\n            let previousIndexValue = nums[index-1]\n            let currentIndexValue = nums[index]\n            \n            if currentIndexValue == previousIndexValue {\n               // noop: ignore left-shift, \n               // this is duplicate element\n            } else {\n                nums[leftIndexToShift+1] = currentIndexValue\n                \n                leftIndexToShift += 1\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return leftIndexToShift + 1\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"remove-duplicates-from-sorted-array"}
